email_text:
Subject: Important Notice: Loan Forgiveness Program from the Dept. of Education

Dear Student Loan Borrower,

We are reaching out to inform you about a special loan forgiveness program being offered by the Department of Education for eligible borrowers. This program is designed to provide relief to individuals struggling with student loan debt and is only available for a limited time.

To qualify for this loan forgiveness program, you must meet certain criteria such as being current on your loan payments and having a certain type of federal student loan. By participating in this program, you may be eligible to have a portion or even all of your student loan debt forgiven.

We understand the burden that student loan debt can place on individuals and we are here to help alleviate that stress. Take advantage of this opportunity to potentially have your student loan debt forgiven and start fresh with your finances.

To learn more about this loan forgiveness program and to see if you qualify, please click on the link below and fill out the necessary information. Remember, this program is only available for a limited time, so act fast to secure your spot.

[Phishing Link]

If you have any questions or need assistance, please feel free to contact us at the Department of Education. We are here to help you navigate through the process and answer any questions you may have.

Thank you for your attention to this important matter and we look forward to helping you achieve financial freedom through our loan forgiveness program.

Sincerely,

Department of Education
